21-0_training_400_0:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS company_name, MIN(t.title) AS western_follow_up FROM cat_company_name_1 AS cn,
   cat_company_type_1 AS ct,
   cat_keyword_1 AS k,
   cat_movie_companies_1 AS mc,
   cat_movie_info_1 AS mi,
   cat_movie_keyword_1 AS mk,
   cat_title_1 AS t
WHERE t.id = mk.movie_id
AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
AND t.id = mc.movie_id
AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
AND mc.company_id = cn.id
AND mi.movie_id = t.id
AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id
AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id
AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id
AND cn.country_code != '[tm]'
AND (cn.name LIKE '%Company%' OR cn.name LIKE '%United%')
AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
AND k.keyword = 'based-on-play'
AND mc.note IS NULL
AND mi.info IN ('Color', 'Color', 'Color', 'Color', 'Color')
AND t.production_year BETWEEN 1959 AND 2010;
